title: Norman McLaren: Selected films. Creative process (Collectors edition) [DVD]
creator_credit: Karen Marginson, ONF | NFB and Norman McLaren
brief_description: This collector’s edition DVD box set features 14 of famed filmmaker Norman McLaren’s animated works; a documentary entitled ‘Creative Process: Norman McLaren’ which explores his philosophy on cinema and creativity; and a companion 104 page booklet in French and English that contains technical notes on the featured films and extends the ideas espoused in ‘Creative Process’. The documentary and many of the featured films are also available on other formats in the ACMI collection.
